body_html:
Hello everyone,

Regarding the warning:
tensorflow/stream_executor/cuda/cuda_driver.cc:523] A non-primary context 0x4eba8a0 exists before initializing the StreamExecutor. We haven't verified StreamExecutor works with that.

I'm having the same warning with 2 GPUs, windows 10, python 2.5.3, all installed through Anaconda. I never thought such warning is problematic more than reporting something "I don't understand". I put a question regards it in what-is-the-reason-of-getting-the-warning-havent-verified-streamexecutor. Still waiting.

I am writing here just to share my similar experience, and hoping that if @thiell has already solved the issue and share his thoughts.

Best wishes,
Alderasus Ghaliamus

body:
Hello everyone,

Regarding the warning:
`tensorflow/stream_executor/cuda/cuda_driver.cc:523] A non-primary context 0x4eba8a0 exists before initializing the StreamExecutor. We haven't verified StreamExecutor works with that.`

I'm having the same warning with 2 GPUs, windows 10, python 2.5.3, all installed through Anaconda. I never thought such warning is problematic more than reporting something "I don't understand". I put a question regards it in [what-is-the-reason-of-getting-the-warning-havent-verified-streamexecutor](https://stackoverflow.com/questions/45760388/what-is-the-reason-of-getting-the-warning-havent-verified-streamexecutor). Still waiting.

I am writing here just to share my similar experience, and hoping that if @thiell has already solved the issue and share his thoughts. 

Best wishes,
Alderasus Ghaliamus
